In round 11, the best move is to keep the relationship warm and confirm immediate readiness without over-applying again, while asking what information would help them decide at round 12.

conversation.message:
Parent_B, thank you—appreciate you staying engaged and being ready to move quickly.

[TALK] To help us finalize fast **if** we move to your position after our end-of-round-12 review, it would be helpful if you could share (by message is fine):
1) Your preferred start date window (earliest/latest) and the days/hours you’d ideally need.
2) Any key needs we should plan for (allergies, medical notes, SEN/support, language considerations).
3) Confirmation of who would be the primary contact and that you can complete deposit/paperwork within 24 hours of an offer.

No need to send sensitive documents yet—just the headline info. If we do reach you after round 12, we can then schedule a quick call/visit and complete the formal paperwork immediately.

Thanks again, and please do check back in round 12/13 as discussed.
conversation.thought: Parent_B is 4th on Nursery_C’s true priority list (D, E, A, B, C). We still have quota 1 and no match yet. Higher-priority parents (D, E, A) have not applied to Nursery_C so far; Parent_C applied and was rejected; Parent_B has repeatedly applied and is eager to commit. However, accepting Parent_B now could forgo a chance to match with Parent_D or Parent_E if they apply in the next rounds (they both rank Nursery_C relatively high: Parent_D has Nursery_C 3rd; Parent_E has Nursery_C 3rd). We previously stated a reassessment at end of round 12, so we should maintain credibility and continue holding through round 12. Since Parent_B sent [TALK], respond with [TALK], request any pre-info to enable quick confirmation if we move to them after round 12, without committing.

conversation.message:
Hello Nursery_C, Parent_B here—thank you again for outlining the end-of-round-12 review. As requested, here are the headline details to help you finalize quickly if you move to my position after the review:

1) Start date window & schedule: We can start as early as immediately (next week) and no later than within the next 2–4 weeks if needed. We’re flexible on days/hours and can adapt to your available sessions; our ideal is weekday coverage during standard working hours, but we can adjust to what you have.

2) Key needs: No known allergies or medical notes to flag at this stage, and no additional support needs we’re aware of. (If you need any specific forms later, we can complete them right away.)

3) Primary contact & ability to finalize: I (Parent_B) will be the primary contact. If offered a place, we can confirm acceptance immediately and complete any deposit/paperwork within 24 hours (same day if possible).

If it would help, I’m also available for a quick call/visit at your convenience after your round-12 review.

Thank you for keeping us in consideration.
conversation.thought: Only Nursery_C remains unmatched and it is on my true preference list (last choice but preferable to being unmatched). Nursery_C indicated they will reassess at the end of round 12, and they requested headline info to enable a fast finalize if they move to my position. I should provide the requested details and reiterate immediate ability to accept, while using [TALK] to keep the channel open without risking another automatic rejection before their end-of-round review.

conversation.message:
Parent_B, thank you—this is very helpful and exactly the kind of information we needed for a quick decision.

[TALK] As this is round 12 (our reassessment point), we are now ready to move forward to the next available family on our priority list who can confirm immediately. If you would like to be considered for the place, please send a formal message to us with the tag **[APPLY]** confirming you accept the place at Nursery_C if offered.

If we receive your [APPLY], we will respond promptly in the next step. Thank you again for your patience and for being ready to finalize quickly.
conversation.thought: Nursery_C’s true priority is D > E > A > B > C. We have quota 1 and remain unmatched. In round 12, only Parent_B contacted us and they are lower priority than D/E/A. However, given we are at the end-of-round-12 reassessment point we previously communicated, and there is no evidence of imminent applications from higher-priority parents (D/E/A have top choices elsewhere and have not approached us). Continuing to hold risks ending unmatched. Parent_B has demonstrated strong commitment and readiness to enroll immediately, reducing execution risk. Best move is to invite an immediate [APPLY] and be prepared to accept if no higher-priority application arrives simultaneously; in this message we must respond with [TALK] because Parent_B used [TALK].

conversation.message:
Hello Nursery_C, Parent_B here.

[APPLY] Thank you for the update. I would like to formally apply for the available place. If offered, I confirm we will accept immediately and can complete any deposit/registration paperwork within 24 hours (same day if possible).

We can start immediately (as early as next week) and are flexible on days/hours to fit your available sessions. I’m the primary contact and am also available for a quick call/visit at your convenience to finalize.

Thank you again for considering us.
conversation.thought: Only Nursery_C remains unmatched and it is on my true preference list (last choice but preferable to being unmatched). Nursery_C explicitly invited me to send a formal [APPLY] in round 13 to be considered after their round-12 reassessment, so I should apply now, reiterate immediate acceptance and ability to complete deposit/paperwork within 24 hours, and restate flexibility on start date and schedule to help them finalize.

conversation.message:
Parent_B, thank you for your formal application and for confirming you can enroll immediately.

[ACCEPT] We are pleased to offer you the available place at Nursery_C.

Please reply to confirm acceptance today, and we will send the registration link and deposit/paperwork checklist. If you’re available, we can also schedule a brief call/visit to finalize start date and sessions.
conversation.thought: Nursery_C priority order is D > E > A > B > C. Parent_B is 4th. Ideally we would match with D/E/A, but none have applied to Nursery_C across the history; Parent_B has repeatedly applied and is ready to confirm immediately. At round 13 (post round-12 reassessment), continuing to hold risks ending unmatched. Accepting Parent_B now secures a match within quota 1 and is consistent with our stated timeline to move to the next available family after round 12.
